revised_title: On the Refractive Indices of Gaseous Potassium, Zinc, Cadmium, Mercury, Arsenic, Selenium, and Tellurium
tldr: The authors investigate the refractive indices of gaseous potassium, zinc, cadmium, mercury, arsenic, selenium, and tellurium using a refractometer. They improve the apparatus and techniques, allowing for more accurate measurements and expanding the understanding of the optical properties of these elements.
